channel.title: Which console should i get?
channel.description:
Alright so im debating on whether to get and original xbox or a ps2 I use to own both of them and i cant really choose one over the other. Discuss
Also please dont discuss any other consoles other than those as i dont want this turning into a console war.

item.title: Which console should i get?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

xbox360 cause it owns

I had a ps2 once upon a time the graphics just can’t be rated with other games.

Read full topic

@TheCyberMan wrote:

I’m going to say PS2

item.title: Which console should i get?

item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

ps2 caus of
[b][size=36pt]
JAK AND DAXTER SERIES

RATCHET AND CLANK SERIES

SLY SERIES

KINGDOM HEARTS[/size][/b]

and many more

nuff said

Read full topic

item.title: Which console should i get?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:25, topic:415339”][quote author=Toxic95 link=topic=517297.msg3780351#msg3780351 date=1318421222]

Xbox 360 because MINECRAFT is gonna come out on it.

He said ORIGINAL.

PS2:
Just right sized gaming controller.
Cheaper, and easier to find games.
XBOX:
Oversized controller.
Shuts down at random times.
Takes forever to boot up.

[center][size=12pt]PS2![/size][/center]
[/quote]

Err… my xbox1 boots faster than my 360 does. Controller size isnt too big of a deciding factor because some companies made the slim ones that almost match a ps2’s. PS2 does have more games flooding the market but that might be because ps3s dropped backwards compatibility so everyone ditched em. Both are relatively easy to mod, so it comes down to personal preference. Does ps2 still have online play?[/quote]I don’t think ps2 still has online but i haven’t bought the adapter to check

Read full topic

item.title: Which console should i get?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:

Xbox 360 because MINECRAFT is gonna come out on it.
[/quote]
He said ORIGINAL.

PS2:
Just right sized gaming controller.
Cheaper, and easier to find games.
XBOX:
Oversized controller.
Shuts down at random times.
Takes forever to boot up.

[center][size=12pt]PS2![/size][/center][/quote]

Err… my xbox1 boots faster than my 360 does. Controller size isnt too big of a deciding factor because some companies made the slim ones that almost match a ps2’s. PS2 does have more games flooding the market but that might be because ps3s dropped backwards compatibility so everyone ditched em. Both are relatively easy to mod, so it comes down to personal preference. Does ps2 still have online play?

Read full topic

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:21, topic:415339”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=517297.msg3757415#msg3757415 date=1316574376]
Lol good idea, I remember having a N64 when i was like 5, those games sell for like hundreds online now. I sold legend of zelda online (gold one) for like $360 when I moved out and needed some quick cash.
[/quote]
Hmmmm, I sold mine for ~$50, and about a month ago bought one for $25.[/quote]

Really?? I have the whole sets of: Mario games, Zelda games, and some others… How much would that run??

item.title: Which console should i get?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:17, topic:415339”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=517297.msg3757415#msg3757415 date=1316574376]

Get both, wait 30 years and hope they’re worth a shit load of money.

Lol good idea, I remember having a N64 when i was like 5, those games sell for like hundreds online now. I sold legend of zelda online (gold one) for like $360 when I moved out and needed some quick cash.
[/quote]

What they really sell for $100’s online? I have 100+ n64 games. I also have legend of zelda majora’s mask collectors edition(gold with 3d label; plain majora’s mask is just gold and a plain sticker label). I couldn’t sell either n64 zelda games I have no matter the price, I mean I could and just play a computer emu but its just not the same.[/quote]
Yeah they really do, I felt like an idiot selling like 300 of them at a yard sale for like 50 cents each lol (I grew up with a brother and three sisters lol). I miss most of the games after selling them on ebay. I also miss my “castlevania symphony of the night” more then anything, I got like $160 for the collectors edition but it was still the best game I ever played to date, and I have played almost all the new games coming out.

Read full topic

I also have legend of zelda majora’s mask collectors edition(gold with 3d label; plain majora’s mask is just gold and a plain sticker label). I couldn’t sell either n64 zelda games I have no matter the price, I mean I could and just play a computer emu but its just not the same.

item.description:

[/quote]Did you ever play jak and daxter or ratchet and clank? I was in love with those games.

[quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=517297.msg3757221#msg3757221 date=1316563000]
Both, they’re both cheap as fuck.
[/quote]I would but seeing as my family is broke as fuck and were living paycheck to paycheck along with the fact that we just spent a lot of money on a funeral.[/quote]
Maybe you shouldn’t be buying either then.
